titles.title: To provide for the establishment of a Department of Veterans Affairs community-based outpatient clinic in Clallam County, Washington.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary: 12/5/2006--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to establish in Clallam County, Washington, a Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) community-based outpatient clinic for the provision of outpatient services to veterans.
